name: Spider Island (UniTerry)
description:
Spider Island is an arcade first person shooter in which you as the player try to kill as many spiders as you can on a procedurally generated deserted island. As you spawn 2 guns are dropped right in front of you to use in your spider extermination quest.

The topology of the island is procedurally generated using Perlin Noise and the spider's walking animation uses Inverse Kinematics to match the height of the terrain.
